title: MINIONS KEEP STEALING MY CS
body:
http://i.imgur.com/cVYYtTX.jpg LIKE WTF RIOT CAN YOU NERF THESE OVERPOWERD MINIONS THEH KEEP STEALING MY CS I HIT IT DOWN TO ALMOST DEAD AND A MINON TAKES IT! I wish that Riot would let us attack our own Allied minions and so when we attacked them the other minions will watch and look at me like wow we shouldn't take Denise's  CS she's getting  a bit aggressive. same with the Towers we should be able to attack our Towers when it also steals our CS

(Not part of the Trolly post: Sorry grammar, spelling, sentence structure jesus LordBahamutXVI  i can't edit well on a phone, english is not everyones first language it makes me mad i take so long to perfect it and you call me out on it.....you yogurt eating boogie monster)
